Package searcher

Searchers are objects that aim to solve the "find kth element" problem from the lecture.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CleverSearcher
    Implements the find (kth) element method by making a smaller array of size K, sorts it, then comparing the larger arrays values to the small array, to see if ones bigger.
    CleverSearcherTimer
    A timer implementation for clever searchers that times the findElement method
    Searcher
    A class that owns an int array, and an index.
    SimpleSearcher
    Implements the find (kth) element method by sorting and indexing, using the naive method of first sorting the whole array and then accessing the (array.length-k)th element.
    SimpleSearcherTimer
    A timer implementation for simple searchers that times the findElement method

Package searcher Description

Searchers are objects that aim to solve the "find kth element" problem from the lecture. A Searcher is given both the array that it is to search in, and the index, k, specifying the kth largest entry that it is to find, when it is constructed.
Version:
September 2019
Author:
Hugh Osborne
